availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles F. Schenck (Hamilton County, Ohio, physician)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, physician. Native of Baden-Baden, Germany. Married to Elizabeth Grey Schenck. Father of Margaret Schenck, Julius Schenck, Alex Schenck, Anson Schenck, Mary Schenck, Walter Schenck, and Herman Schenck. Physician in Franklin County in 1850. Physician in Hamilton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Frankln County, Columbus Ward 4, p. 263B.
